resources.string: This application allows for simple conversions between any two chosen currencies. An amount should be specified to be converted. This application uses the Currency Converter API by natkapral on RapidAPI with the Currency Converter endpoint, which retrieves the currency conversion. \n\nSelect a currency from the first spinner that you want to convert from, and a second currency from the second spinner that you want to convert to, then specify an amount and press convert.
